mapper.update:
UPDATE attachment
id = #{id},
relevanceTable = #{relevanceTable},
relevanceId = #{relevanceId},
userId = #{userId},
userName = #{userName},
contractId = #{contractId},
code = #{code},
fileName = #{fileName},
suffix = #{suffix},
savePathFile = #{savePathFile},
tag = #{tag},
addDate = #{addDate},
addUser = #{addUser},
addIp = #{addIp},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
